title: ২০২৪ সালের বন্যা দুর্গতদের জন্য সাহায্যের আবেদন
message: FSDG (Foundation for Supporting Development Goals) is a Non-government Organization (NGO) registered under Joint Stock Company, Bangladesh in 2016. FSDG has been working to support the most marginalized population in Mymensingh, Barisal, Jhalkati and Panchagarh with safe water, shelter and agriculture.
